longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 6 months from date of arrival.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of New Caledonia can
obtain a visa on arrival for a max. stay of 90 days.
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of New Caledonia will be
  expected to hold their own passport or National ID Card
  (where applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia,
  Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.
- Visitors wishing to travel to Kwajalein are required to hold
  an Entry Authorisation issued by the US Military.
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets .



 Marshall Isl
